title: AztroGrit Silicon Carbide Powder - F800; 250 gm
features: Made in USA. High purity (>97%) free flowing black Silicon Carbide Powder with Knoop Hardness: 2480; Particle Shape: Sharp
F800 ultra fine Silicon Carbide Powder / Grit offers excellent abrasive properties for intricate lapping (of natural stones and fine ceramic stones) and machining.

Fine powder provides better control and hence is recommended for all stages of lapping making precision lapping a reality. Note: Add water to make suspension (during lapping). Other Applications: ceramic brake discs, armor material, seal ring material
Sealable zip-lock bag lets you use only as much as you need
From Aztron Technologies, an ISO 9001 / AS 9100D certified company.
